relatedanime.anime: The King of Fighters: Another Day

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: SOUTH TOWN
South Town
South Town
episode.summary: After arriving in South Town, Kyo, an invitee to KOF, runs into another formidable fighter, Terry. Ten years have passed since the tragedy that changed his live forever… The destinies of the fighters now cross here in South Town. Source: steam

episode.title: BROTHER
Brother
Brother
episode.summary: After leaving the nightclub, Terry is challenged by a mysterious fighter. This fighter turns out to be Andy, Terry`s little brother, who he has not seen in 10 years. In order to take revenge on Geese for what he did to their father, Jeff, they team up with Joe to infiltrate Geese Tower. Source: steam

episode.title: ANGELINA
Angelina
Angelina
episode.summary: Kyo and Ryo hit it off immediately. They receive a call about Yuri, Ryo`s little sister, and how she has ran away from home. While searching for information about Geese, Terry bumps into a mysterious lady named Angelina at a nightclub. Source: steam

episode.title: KYOKUGEN STYLE
Kyokugen Style
Kyokugen Style
episode.summary: When Kyo, Benimaru and Daimon visit the Kyokugen Style Dojo in South Town, they come across Ryo chasing down men in black suits. Kyo and his friends head off to Geese Tower in pursuit as well. Once they arrive at the tower, Geese’s right-hand man, Billy descends on them. Source: steam

episode.title: RECEPTION
Reception
Reception
episode.summary: Fighters come together in the announcement event for KOF. Benimaru gets excited with the heated atmosphere, Athena attracts everybody in the venue, Ryo reunites with his sister, Yuri, Mai starts to quarrel with Andy... All fighter`s minds cross here before KOF. Source: steam

episode.title: MEMORIES
Memories
Memories
episode.summary: Terry tails Angelina to search for more information about Geese. He finds Angelina who is threatened by Matt. Matt is a following of Geese and Terry saves Angelina from his hands. Angelina suddenly recalls what happened in her past. Source: steam

episode.title: QUEENS TEAM
Queens Team
Queens Team
episode.summary: Kyo senses the power of Orochi in South Town and is concerned whether the Orochi seal is weakening. In another part of the world, Yuri is searching for teammates to participate in the KOF tournament with her. While in London she runs into two female fighters, King and Mai. Source: steam

episode.title: SIDE STORY- GEESE HOWARD
Side Story - Geese Howard
Side Story - Geese Howard
episode.summary: When Geese was young, he was driven out from Stroheim Castle since his mother was not the legal wife of his father. After wandering on his own, he becomes a disciple of Tung. During his time there he harbors hatred for another disciple, Jeff, over who will inherit Tung`s role and secrets. Source: steam

episode.title: SECRET
Secret
Secret
episode.summary: Terry sneaks out from the KOF announcement event and successfully infiltrates Geese Tower. He witnesses a dreadful experiment in the basement of the tower. Meanwhile Geese discovers the truth behind Terry`s past and gives an "order" to Angelina. Source: steam

episode.title: SHADOW OF EVIL
Shadow of Evil
Shadow of Evil
episode.summary: The first KOF match starts out with a bang, with all eyes on the event. Benimaru struggles in his battle against Brian, as he continues to stand back up no matter how many times he is beaten by Benimaru. The crowd becomes uneasy as they watch Brian`s eerie performance. Source: Steam

episode.title: READY GO!
Ready Go!
Ready Go!
episode.summary: Angelina is ordered to kill Terry by poisoning him. A blond haired kid suddenly appears and pretends Terry is his dad to escape trouble. Soon afterwards, the KOF tournament gets underway at the stadium. The audience gets hype as the fighters prepare to battle it out! Source: Steam

episode.title: SIDE STORY - NIKAIDO BENIMARU
Side Story - Nikaido Benimaru
Side Story - Nikaido Benimaru
episode.summary: No one could stand a chance against Benimaru until he met Kyo. Benimaru begs Kyo for a re-match before mysterious men in black suddently surround Kyo. The men confront and attack Kyo in front of Benimaru. How will Benimaru react to this unexpected brawl!? Source: Steam

episode.title: TRAP
Trap
Trap
episode.summary: Kyo and his teammates struggle with the American Sports Team who show signs of the Orochi power. Meanwhile, Terry heads to Gesse Tower to rescue Angelina, despite knowing it`s a trap. Source: steam

episode.title: FATAL FURY
Fatal Fury
Fatal Fury
episode.summary: Terry and Angelina try to escape from Geese Tower. However, when they arrive on the top floor, Terry`s sworn enemy, Geese, stands in their way. In order to take revenge for his father and save Angelina, Terry`s Fatal Fury begins! Source: steam

episode.title: SIDE STORY - ANGELINA
Side Story - Angelina
Side Story - Angelina
episode.summary: Ten years ago, Terry became a disciple of Tung. On the day of his departure, he saves a girl being threatened by local punks. Terry tries to cheer her up by suggesting that they both leave South Town together. Her name is Angelina... Source: steam

episode.title: Destiny
episode.summary: Rugal has achieved the power of a god and the fighters try their best to take him down. Revenge, love, hate, ambition…THE KING OF FIGHTERS gets chaotic in this final epic battle! The destinies of these KOF fighters cross and give birth to a new history!

episode.title: Final Round
episode.summary: Geese has obtained the power of Orochi. Terry struggles to deal with Geese`s overwhelming power. Geese readies his finishing move for Terry, who is fighting for his life. This fatal battle between these two fighters will decide their ultimate destiny.

episode.title: Black Crystal
episode.summary: A party is held on a cruise ship and the fighters gather to relax before the final round. However, the organizer "R" has set a trap for them. Meanwhile, Kyo and his friends sneak out of the tournament venue and bear witness to the power of the black crystal.

episode.title: Escape
episode.summary: Athena and her teammates battle Kim Team who have turned violent. Athena tries to expose the secret of the Black Crystal with her Psychic Power. Meanwhile, Kyo attempts to escape from their cell with Benimaru and Daimon who came to their senses, springing a new trap in the process!

episode.title: Labyrinth
episode.summary: The Fatal Fury Team successfully infiltrates the cruise ship. However, while traversing the ship which has turned into a labyrinth, they are attacked by Mai and her teammates, who have lost control. Both Andy and Joe are beaten, while Terry is confronted by another assassin.

episode.title: Side Story - King
episode.summary: King works as a bouncer in order to pay the medical bills for her little brother, Jan. The owner orders her to kill Ryo who is on his way to save his little sister, Yuri, who has been kidnapped. The lives of King and Jan are dramatically changed by meeting the Sakazaki siblings.

episode.title: Generator
episode.summary: Athena senses the energy source of the evil power and uses her telepathy to inform Kyo. Kyo and his teammates find a generator which has a black crystal to generate the evil power and attempt to destroy it. However, Ryo and Robert have run berserk as well and stand in their way.

episode.title: R
episode.summary: Fighters have been released from the evil mind control by breaking the generator. Kyo and Terry head to the bridge in order to put a period to this incident. The organizer, R finally appears in their way and now the story of the KOF goes to the end…!

episode.title: Rugal Bernstein
episode.summary: Rugal is behind the KOF, using it to take control of the fighters by using the Black Crystals. Kyo and Terry cooperate to try and take down Rugal. However, they are forced into a desperate situation when faced with Rugal`s overwhelming power and stone-cold killer instincts.
